title: International Relations and Global Governance

vocab.definition: Distribution of power among states preventing dominance by any one
Cooperation among three or more states on common issues
Ability to influence through attraction rather than coercion
Rules governing relations between sovereign states
System where aggression against one is treated as aggression against all

teachingNotes: Analyze power dynamics and international institutions. Examine challenges to global governance.

sample.question: What prevents dominance by distributing power among states?

truefalse.question: Soft power influences through attraction rather than coercion.

multiplechoice.question: What describes cooperation among three or more states?

fillintheblank.question: Rules governing relations between states form ________ law.

shortanswer.question: How does collective security system work?
